title: Rage Potion
summaries: The Rage Potion is a buff potion which grants the Rage buff when consumed. The buff increases a player's critical strike chance by 10%. This lasts for 4 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon using Cycle Next/Previous Buff and then pressing Remove Buff ([img:Console version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]).

(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) This potion can only be crafted in worlds with Crimson due to it requiring the Hemopiranha, although it is possible to make an artificial Crimson biome in a Corruption world by importing either Crimson blocks, Red Solution, or Crimson Seeds.

(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) As of version 1.4.0.1, it is possible to naturally acquire a Rage Potion in a Corruption world by purchasing Crimson Seeds from the Dryad in a Hardmode Graveyard biome, and using the Crimson Seeds to make an artificial Crimson biome to fish in.
